definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: All grocery shopping bags contain at least one stick of French bread.
sentences.chinese: 所有超市购物袋里都装着至少一根法式长棍面包。

sentences.english: In Pas-de-Calais the French lifestyle is better.
sentences.chinese: 加莱海峡省的法式生活才更逍遥。

sentences.english: You say you're looking for the French bakery?
sentences.chinese: 你是说你在找那个法式面包店吗？

sentences.english: Ricotta cheese in cream sauce with the thinly sliced potato.
sentences.chinese: 马铃薯和法式白酱加上口感浓郁的瑞卡达起司。

sentences.english: Yes，French kiss is called a “juncture of souls” in France.
sentences.chinese: 是的，法式热吻在法语里被称作“灵魂时刻”。

sentences.english: The offering of the baguette and finest Danish butter ( Lurpak ) was for me reminiscent of Paris.
sentences.chinese: 法式面包和最精美的丹麦黄油，让我想起了巴黎。

sentences.english: French kiss is called a “juncture of souls” in France.
sentences.chinese: 法式热吻在法语里被称作“灵魂时刻”。

sentences.english: Dry of 'French' vermouth is almost colorless, and has a delicate flavor.
sentences.chinese: 法式味美思干酒基本无色，酒香清淡。

sentences.english: Do you think that French fries are really French?
sentences.chinese: 你该不会真的以为法式炸薯条是法国的吧？

sentences.english: The extensive menu at Le 5 Sens offers several appealing starters to begin the French experience.
sentences.chinese: 乐尚的超长菜单引领新客开始这趟法式之旅。

sentences.english: I know the most famous kiss is French kiss, right?
sentences.chinese: 我还知道最著名的吻是法式热吻，对吗？

sentences.english: Bye bye American fries, Bonjour pâtisseries of Paris.
sentences.chinese: 再见了美国烤鸡，我来了，巴黎的法式糕点。

sentences.english: And tasted me deeply with French kisses.
sentences.chinese: 用法式香吻深深地感受着我。

sentences.english: Waiter, do you have some catchup?I want some for this French fries.
sentences.chinese: 服务员，你们有酱吗？法式炸薯条我要加些酱。

sentences.english: Eggs is the basic ingredient to many dishes, like omelet and french toast.
sentences.chinese: 鸡蛋是最基本的要素很多菜，喜欢煎蛋和法式面包。

sentences.english: Bartholomew grabbed a loaf of French bread.
sentences.chinese: 巴塞罗谬手里抓着一根法式面包。

definition: to pass an exam (or the imperial exam)/to qualify

to return to old ways (a Confucian aspiration)/to turn back the clock/neoclassical school during Tang and Song associated with classical writing 古文/retro (fashion style based on nostalgia, esp. for 1960s)
macaron, French pastry with a soft filling sandwiched between the meringue-based cookie shells (loanword)
harmonious combination of Chinese and Western elements (idiom)
variant of 別緻|别致[bie2 zhi4]
